list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: time bug fixed and time to string methods added

task.summary: 1. google.Gson added to dependencies 2. database basics done! (like easyDataAndroid) 3. Test model and test speed added
1. layout replacement done. 2. 5 tables added to database 3. many custom queries added to Repos 4. SQLiteDatabase class is now fully static (we just need one connection)
1. fix date system bug 2. more cool Log 3. Toolbar 4. Database test done 5. some queries added
